post.text:
Join me LIVE in Leesburg, VA!

Be a voter. Learn more >> http://www.Vote.GOP
Contribute & Add your name >> www.DonaldJTrump.com/DrainTheSwamp

comment.author: Joshua
comment.text: Mr. President, you need to get some rest, take care of yourself. Thank you for fighting so hard for us. It's in the American people's hands and the good Lord above.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: God came in my dream and said Trump has been touched at his birth by Satan. His soul is tarnished beyond salvation. He is deceaving like the devil himself. Anyone voting for trump will suffer eternal torment in hell.

replies.author: Rylie
replies.text: Who's the president in your cuckoo land Taylor

replies.author: Chad
replies.text: We were blessed in Minnesota Sunday by a visit from our next President! 8k inside another 17k plus outside! Minnesota will be red if this election is Honest.

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: One more day or two of work and he can start resting a bit. I already voted for him & lots of my women friends did & their families. This election brought out the worst & best of people. I really appreciate Mr. Trump for putting a lot of his hard earned resources to this campaign. A lot of obstacles because he is an outsider and not beholden to any politician, special interests nor the main stream media. All the powers that be tried so hard to stop him but the people already chose him. No other candidate like Donald J. Trump. 👍👍👍💪💪💪
